About Me

Let me tell you about myself ...

BIO

I'm a system developer and business analyst who works as part of your team to combine your business expertise and my systems expertise to bring greater efficiency to your business. I provide CRM, bespoke software development, data integration, website development and database development as well as multimedia authoring, technical authoring, business analysis and project management.\n\n I work remotely and will attend meetings in most places.\n Company Name: Shimini Solutions Ltd.\n Industry: Information Technology\n Employees: 1
